skillTree.name: Patchwork Gromril Armour
skillTree.description: Being bigger than the average stormvermin, Ska had to take many scavenged plates of Gromril armor to fit his enormous size.

skillTree.name: Pretty Sharp-Thing
skillTree.description: "Mighty Queek says he not want-need stupid Dwarf-thing axe! Ska take for himself!"

skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Horned Rat
skillTree.description: All the hate, envy, and malice uttered in prayer each day, returned a thousand-fold.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Stay-Fight!
skillTree.description: "No flee-scurry! Kill-Slay!

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Brave-Mighty!
skillTree.description: Ska not scared! Ska the mightiest! Except Warlord Queek.

skillTree.name: Kill-Slay!!
skillTree.description: Ska Bloodtail's mere presence encourages his allies to fight harder and kill-kill!

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5% for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skavenslaves, Clan Rats, and Stormvermin units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Where Ska?!
skillTree.description: Queek needs Ska now!

skillTree.name: Ska!! Break them!
skillTree.description: Queek demands his loyal servant to fight harder, and clear path so mighty Queek can take his prize!

skillTree.name: Die-Die-Die!!!
skillTree.description: Ska Bloodtail works up a frenzy to all around him. Victory is near!

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Right Paw of Queek
backgroundSkills.description: Ska Bloodtail is Warlord Queek's only trusted Lieutenant.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)
